p: Additionally, we performed GO enrichment analysis of the four largest categories of DEGs (Cat_1, Cat_2, Cat_4 and Cat_5, Additional file 1: Fig. S6) and found different enrichment for oncogenic regulating pathways such as Cytoskeleton (Cat_1), grow factor signaling (Cat_2), NF-kappaB and Tyrosine Kinase Signaling (Cat_4), Lysosome (Cat_5). Additional file 1: Fig. S7 includes validation by qPCR for mRNA levels of several genes of these categories (TGFB1, TGFB2, ZYX, NFKBIA and SDC4) in an independent experiment showing that these gene followed the same pattern of our analysis.
